messages.content: Everyone...should understand the...difference voting UKIP can make. A vote cast...by direct referendum...No to government cuts, Yes to all major issues put to you, the public in referenda.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support for direct referendums on all major issues, opposition to government cuts.
Support for improving standards and discipline in local schools.
Pressure for healthy food in hospitals and local school meals.

mentions.candidate: Everyone...should understand the...difference voting UKIP can make.

issues.brexitEurope: We must take the opportunity presented by Brexit to fully take back control of our laws, our money, our borders and our trade.
issues.education: Support for improving standards and discipline in local schools.
issues.governance: Support for direct referendums on all major issues, opposition to government cuts.
issues.health: Pressure for healthy food in hospitals and local school meals.
